name: ASAuthorizationControllerDelegate
desc: An interface for providing information about the outcome of an authorization request.

items.name: func authorizationController(controller: ASAuthorizationController, didCompleteWithAuthorization: ASAuthorization)
items.desc: Tells the delegate when authorization completes successfully.

items.name: class ASAuthorization
items.desc: The encapsulation of a successful authorization by a controller.

items.name: func authorizationController(controller: ASAuthorizationController, didCompleteWithError: Error)
items.desc: Tells the delegate when authorization fails, and provides an error explaining why.

items.name: struct ASAuthorizationError
items.desc: Errors that can occur during authorization.

items.name: func authorizationController(ASAuthorizationController, didCompleteWithCustomMethod: ASAuthorizationCustomMethod)
items.desc: Informs the delegate when authorization completes, and specifies the custom method the user selected.
